summary: IGNITION COIL FAILURE ON 2002 VW JETTA.  CAR MUST BE TOWED IF IT IS ANY DISTANCE FROM DEALERSHIP.  HAS NO POWER WHEN FAILURE OCCURS...SAFETY ISSUE ON A HIGHWAY, WITH A SUDDEN LOSS OF POWER. SAFETY ISSUE  FOR A WOMAN WAITING  ALONE ON THE ROAD SIDE FOR A TOW.  CAN NOT DRIVE A CAR WITH 9000 MILES WITH ANY CONFIDENCE THAT IT WILL NOT PUT ME IN DANGER THAT I WILL NOT BE ABLE TO CONTROL.      TS
